thread.title: Superb hotel. Fantastic staff
thread.title_full: Superb hotel. Fantastic staff - Review of Villa Royale Montsouris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: bsog81
title: Superb hotel. Fantastic staff
text: We have just got back from a superb stay in Paris. Made better by the wonderful and unique hotel. The rooms are beautifully decorated in a colourful North African theme. The room was very comfortable and clean and you say we were in a bustling city very quiet too. The staff were polite, helpful and friendly which was nice too. Breakfast was very tasty and fresh with plenty of options and was always a great start to the day. Couldn't fault anything that wouldn't be personal preference, so I won't. We would definitely go back and will recommend to others. Merci.
